items.text: Volley provides the following classes for JSON requests:
items.href: Make a standard request  |  Android Developers

items.text:
JsonArrayRequest—A request for retrieving a
  JSONArray
  response body at a given URL.
items.href: Make a standard request  |  Android Developers

items.text:
JsonObjectRequest—A request for retrieving a
  JSONObject
  response body at a given URL, allowing for an optional
  JSONObject
  to be passed in as part of the request body.
items.href: Make a standard request  |  Android Developers

items.text:
You use them
following the same basic pattern you use for other types of requests.
items.href: Make a standard request  |  Android Developers

items.text:
For example, this
snippet fetches a JSON feed and displays it as text in the UI:
items.href: Make a standard request  |  Android Developers
